item.title: [delta] clan chat problem
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

when i add this case:

[code=text] case 76:
//
//Clan Chat join
long long1 = inStream.readQWord();
String chatname = nameForLong(long1);
boolean worked = false;
boolean quit = false;
//sM(“Packet taken: " +chatname);
if (chatname.equalsIgnoreCase(“leave”)) {
if (hasChat) {
for(int s = 18144; s <= 18244; s++) {
sendText(”", s);
}
sendText(“Talking in: Not in Chat”, 18139);
sendText(“Owner: None”, 18140);
for (int a = 0; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++)
{
client c = getClient(a);

					if (!validClient(a))
						continue;
						
					if (c.chatName.equalsIgnoreCase(chatName)) {
						c.chatName = "";
						c.chatOwner = "";
						c.sendText("Talking in: Not in Chat", 18139);
						c.sendText("Owner: None", 18140);
						c.chatOwnerID = -1;
						for(int p = 18143; p <= 18244; p++) {
							c.sendText("", p);
						}
						c.sM("The clan has disbanded.");
					}
				}
				hasChat = false;
				chatOwner = "";
				chatName = "";
				chatMembers = 0;
				chatOwnerID = -1;
				chatMemberNames = new String [100];
				quit = true;
				//break;
			} else if (!chatName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
			{
				for(int s = 18144; s <= 18244; s++) {
					sendText("", s);
				}
				sendText("Talking in: Not in Chat", 18139);
				sendText("Owner: None", 18140);
				int clanmembers = 0;
				for (int a = 0; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) 
				{
					client c = getClient(a);
					
					if (!validClient(a))
						continue;
						
					if (c.chatName.equalsIgnoreCase(chatName)) {
						for(int q = 18144; q <= 18244; q++) {
							c.sendText("", q);
						}
						clanmembers += 1;
						int line2 = 18143 + clanmembers;
						c.sendText(c.playerName, line2);
						c.sM(playerName+" has left the clan.");
					}
				}
				hasChat = false;
				chatOwner = "";
				chatName = "";
				chatMembers = 0;
				chatOwnerID = -1;
				chatMemberNames = new String [100];
				quit = true;
				//break;
			}
		}
		if (chatName.equalsIgnoreCase("") && !quit) {
			for (int ID = 0; ID < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; ID++) 
			{
				client p = getClient(ID);
				
				if (!validClient(ID))
					continue;
				if (p.playerName != null) 
				{
					if (p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(chatname)) {
						if (p.hasChat) {
							chatOwner = chatname;
							chatName = p.chatName;
							chatOwnerID = ID;
							sendText("Talking in: @whi@"+p.chatName, 18139);
							sendText("Owner: @whi@"+p.playerName, 18140);
							p.chatMembers += 1;
							p.chatMemberNames[p.chatMembers + 1] = playerName;
							sM("You have successfully joined "+p.playerName+"'s clan chat channel.");
							sM("To leave the clan press Join Chat and type 'leave'.");
							worked = true;
						} else {
							sM("This player doesn't own a clan.");
						}
					}
				} else {
					sM("This player is not online or doesn't exist.");
				}
			}
		} else {
			sM("You are already in a clan chat.");
		}
		if (worked && !quit) {
			if (!chatName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
				int clanmembers = 0;
				for (int a = 0; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) 
				{
					client c = getClient(a);
					
					if (!validClient(a))
						continue;
						
					if (c.chatName.equalsIgnoreCase(chatName)) {
						clanmembers += 1;
						int line = getNextChatLine(chatOwnerID);
						c.sendText(playerName, line);
						c.sM("[@blu@"+chatName+"@bla@] "+playerName+" has joined the clan.");
						int line2 = 18143 + clanmembers;
						sendText(c.playerName, line2);
					}
				}
			}
		}
	break;
	
	case 81:
		// 
		//Clan Chat create
		long chatnamelong = inStream.readQWord();
		String chatname2 = nameForLong(chatnamelong);
		char first = chatname2.charAt(0);
		boolean worked2 = false;
		chatname2 = Character.toUpperCase(first)+ chatname2.substring(1, chatname2.length());
		//sM("Packet taken: " +chatname2);
		if (chatName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
			hasChat = true;
			chatName = chatname2;
			chatOwner = playerName;
			sendText("Talking in: @whi@"+chatName, 18139);
			sendText("Owner: @whi@"+playerName, 18140);
			chatMembers += 1;
			sM("You have created '"+chatName+"' clan chat channel.");
			sM("To leave the clan press Join Chat and type 'leave'.");
			worked2 = true;
		} else {
			sM("You are already in a clan chat.");
		}
		if (worked2) {
			for (int a = 0; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) 
			{
				client c = getClient(a);
				
				if (!validClient(a))
					continue;
					
				if (c.chatName.equalsIgnoreCase(chatName)) {
					int line = getNextChatLine(playerId);
					c.sendText(playerName, line);
					c.sM(playerName+" has joined the clan.");
				}
			}
		}
	break;[/code]

it says this error:

client.java:1120: orphaned case case 76: ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

can someone help me?
